1441411 4444 11 miles. At
the entrant'e to the 11111111 11111111 111115.111. the: channel turns
sharply 11'; feet
at high Nile and 40 feet at low Nile. rThe 4.4444144414414145 144544.
the Cleveland Bridge and Engineering Company (Limited), of
Darlington, who completed the bridge In December, 1908.
